Gm üòä, I‚Äôm a little new to writing EIPs, but a huge emerging problem I see is NFT / SBT spamming / friction to burning NFTs. 

In Solana, there is a concept called Rent where on transaction you pay a fee which would cover the cost of gas to burn an NFT. 

Burning gives a small reward to incentivize reporting spam.

Do you think there would be interest in implement a similar improvement into Ethereum?

author: hackwithzach
content: The basic tl;dr of this EIP would be to increase the cost to mint a token to a wallet address to cover the gas to burn an token. I believe this should happen on the chain level regardless of the token standard.
